attributes.action: Make the Queen's birthday a national holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In avid support of the Queen I feel that the Queen's birthday should be celebrated as a national holiday in the UK. The Queen's birthday is already celebrated in Australia, New Zealand, Canada and Fiji, therfore it seems imperative that Britian should also join in the celebration of our Monarch's history.
